mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(NUM) FROM BB_COMMENT WHERE BOOKNUM=#{bookNum}
mapper.insert: insert into BB_Comment(NUM, BOOKNUM, WRITER, CONTENTS, REGDATE) values (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{bookNum},#{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT RONUM R, C.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BB_COMMENT WHERE BOOKNUM=#{bookNum} ORDER BY NUM DESC) C) WHERE R BETWEEN #{statRow} AND {lastRow} ;
